attributes.action: Change the voting system from first past the post to proportional representation
attributes.additional_details:
Most of Europe uses proportional representation such as Spain,italy
Iceland,Greenland,ireland,

With proportional representation if 20% of the county votes for party A they have 20% of uk seats in parliament ,making it simple for the public to understand and not to be scared of voting but also more fair and show what the public truly think

I put fouth the idea of a referendum to see if British should stay with first past the post or proportional representation.
attributes.background: Within British society individuals want to vote for party's that shows what the people want. However with first past the post in a area 20% may vote for party A ,but 35% may vote for party B. The 20% votes are forgotten not getting a say in Parliament.
